Item 7.01 Regulation FD Disclosure. On July 2, 2021, Tesla, Inc. published the press release which is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by reference. &#160; This information is intended to be furnished under Items 2.02 and 7.01 of Form 8-K and shall not be deemed &#x201c;filed&#x201d; for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#x201c; Exchange Act &#x201d;), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing.
